decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnamed proposal sketch, undated, received 30/08/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.
Condition : 4 - The crossover shall not exceed 2.4m in width.

Condition : 5 - A 0.6m high front boundary wall in brickwork to match the front of the house shall be constructed except at point of access before the vehicle crossover hereby approved is first brought into use and permanently retained thereafter.
description: Creation of a vehicular access and formation of a vehicle hardstanding
